abstract: Ran Yunfei is one of those writers who has been invited to "drink tea" with the State Security goons - a euphemism in China for being summoned by the authorities for questioning. It seems Mr. Ran had written last year that China, unless it made certain reforms, risked the sort of political tumult that was then underway in Egypt, Tunisia and Libya. Detained without trial for six months, he was released last month from house arrest.

headline.main: A Chinese Scholar, Summoned for Tea
